exec: tests["Body contains list of service templates"] = stplData;

tests["Body contains added passive checks enabled"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("stpl_passive_check_enabled") == stplData[i]['passive checks enabled'];

tests["Body contains list of contacts"] = contactData;
